articles.author: Associated Press, By Associated Press
articles.title: Gray's 7 shutout innings lead Rockies past Angels, 4-2
articles.description: DENVER — Jon Gray was staring at a big first-inning jam, but one good pitch got him out of it and kept the Colorado Rockies rolling. Gray continued Colorado's strong stretch of starts with seven scoreless innings, and the Rockies beat the Los Angeles Angels 4…

articles.author: Dan Favale
articles.title: NBA Teams That Could Be Surprising Title Contenders Next Year
articles.description: Legitimately joining the race for an NBA title is hard. The contenders clique is inherently exclusive. More than half the league earns a playoff bid, but most postseason squads are steppingstones prolonging the inevitable...

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Jets place McCown on IR, officially end QB's season
articles.description: Josh McCown is officially done for the season - and maybe for his career.  The New York Jets placed the 38-year-old quarterback on injured reserve on Tuesday, two days after he broke his left hand in a 23-0 loss at Denver.  Coach Todd Bowles announced Monday …
